attributes.action: bring back biscuits for Welbeck DSFC on a Monday, Wednesday, and Friday.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently, the Biscuit supply for Welbeck DSFC was cut.

This travesty means that we, the students, do not have snacks to provide us with sustinance throughout the day.

In accordance with Boarding Schools regulations, we need these back.

Please sign, and help us get our biccys back!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
